main event: Dr. George A. Falkner observed a brilliant blueish light in the sky from his home in Covington, Ohio, which he reported to the ATIC Duty Officer.
interesting points: The object was tracked on GCA scope for 3 hours and 15 minutes., The object remained stationary at 8 miles high during the observation., Dr. Falkner had seen the same light at least 6 times over the past two months., Other witnesses in the area included Mr. and Mrs. Pearl Etter., The light had a bobbing motion and appeared to be in the same location each time.
witness description: Dr. George A. Falkner and Mr. and Mrs. Pearl Etter
